title: Find k
text: Let k $$=$$ the 95th percentile. Find k where P( x̄ < k) $$=$$ 0.95

title: Explanation
text: The 95th percentile for the sample mean excess time used is about 26.0 minutes for random samples of 80 customers who exceed their contractual allowed time. Ninety five percent of such samples would have means under 26 minutes; only five percent of such samples would have means above 26 minutes.
